alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 5:11PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Umatilla County through 545 PM PDT... At 510 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 18 miles southwest of Rieth, or 20 miles southwest of Pendleton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspout possible, winds in excess of 30 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Umatilla County. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
